item.title: lampy's revenge 2024
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Canadian Southern Baptist Seminary - Cochrane Course: stravalink The Peloton Cycling Club put on “Lampy’s Revenge” the day after Deadgoat Supercross on the same grounds but in the opposite direction, I believe1. results ABA Results CrossResults Podia Expert Men Joel DYCK Steven SOON2 Jared GERVAIS3 Novice Men James CHALKLEY4 Dylan COOK Zachary BROMBEISS5 Open Men Mark FAGNAN6 Shawn BUNNIN7 Colton ZABOLOTNEY Open Women Emma SCOTT8 Justine SAGAN Jay SMITH Sport Men Cor SINKE Quinten MACKLEM9 Nigel BAINES10 Sport Women Daniella BREWSTER11 Charlie PITTARD12 Madeline MAGLEO my results Did not race.

item.title: the real diehl cyclocross 2023
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Canadian Southern Baptist Seminary - Cochrane Course: stravalink “The Real Diehl” Cyclocross Peloton’s first CX race they’ve put on.
